article.headline: Savannah St. 66, Coastal Caroloina 65
article.story: SAVANNAH, Ga. (AP) -- Joseph Flegler hit two 3-pointers in the final minute, including the game-clincher with 18 seconds remaining in a 66-65 victory over Coastal Carolina Thursday night for the Tigers' second straight win. Javon Randolph led Savannah State (10-15) with 22 points, 20 of them in the first half to help build a 39-26 lead going into intermission. The Tigers, who also got 11 points each from Flegler and Josh Obiajunwa, spread the margin to 17 points when Chris Linton hit a 3-pointer with 16:18 to play to make the score 49-32. The Chanticleers (11-11) chipped away through the final 10 minutes, taking a 58-57 lead with three minutes left on a 3-pointer by Jack Leasure, who led Coastal with 22 points. A pair of Leasure free throws made it 60-57, but an Obiajunwa basket cut it to 60-59. In the final second, Coastal's Joshua Mack was fouled and made the front end of a one-and-one but the game-tying shot rattled around and fell out.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
